name: Calculate Hours for Cause and Effect Matrix
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA Cause and Effect Matrix:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((8*<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>))*0.25)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(((8*<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>))*0.25))*0.5) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(FDA GES Location)*>,None))){<* Eval((((8*<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>))*0.25))*0.5)*1.1) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
